unnormalised: Arre yaar, pesticide use is scary! Remember the Bhopal tragedy? Even now, farmers in Vidarbha struggle. My Nana used to say, "organic is the way!" I started my kitchen garden in 2022 inspired by him. But getting rid of pests naturally is tough! Need better training for Kisan Vikas Kendra guys. Heard they're doing workshops in Pune on 26/01/2024 at 14:00 hrs and another on 10/07/2024, let's see. Alternatives are costly though, at least Rs. 5000 per acre.
normalised: Arre yaar, pesticide use is scary! Remember the Bhopal tragedy? Even now, farmers in Vidarbha struggle. My Nana used to say, "organic is the way!" I started my kitchen garden in two thousand and twenty two inspired by him. But getting rid of pests naturally is tough! Need better training for Kisan Vikas Kendra guys. Heard they're doing workshops in Pune on twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty four at two P M and another on tenth July two thousand and twenty four, let's see. Alternatives are costly though, at least rupee five thousand per acre.
